评论概述: I own this dress in 4 colors!
评论详情: This dress is my perfect work dress. The waist sits at my natural waist and the pleats allow it to flare out. The pockets are large enough for my phone, wallet, and keys and the pockets work well with the pleating so that they aren't bulging when full. This dress is formal enough for my office but has just enough stretch and soft enough fabric that I am comfortable all day.  I was on a delicate cycle and hang dry. I have had no issues with fading or the fabric.  I would not recommend the versions with white/light top fabric - the tops are quite sheer. The versions with black/navy tops have given me no issues.
I love everything about it.
Got this for my daughter for her orchestra concert and it’s extremely flattering and classy. She loved the pockets that it has and found the dress very comfortable.

Ladies, this dress has pockets! I was so excited for this lol. The fabric is nice and soft, with also a little stretch. It’s so comfortable and I instantly fell inlove as soon as I put it on. It’s HARD for me to find things I like, or things that make me feel confident in my PP body. This dress made me smile and feel pretty. It’s flowy enough that it hides my belly but not make me look large. The floral design is really pretty and perfect for the spring/summer season. I’m honestly going to buy another dress or two because I love it so much. The quality still seems really good after washing and wearing a few times. I’m happily surprised with this. I highly recommend!

I have very little complaints with this dress! The few things I wish I could change are… The high waist is extremely high like right under my chest. I wish it was just a smidge lower. Also, the nude top of the dress has a very pink tone to it. It doesn’t match “true“ nude shoes and handbags. But, with the colorful skirt to break it up it doesn’t bother me enough to return it. The dress is a much heavier material than I anticipated, the colors on the skirt are vibrant, and the sizing was very accurate. I was comfortable in it all day at work and will wear often.
